trans-unit.source: Provides rendering capabilities for the associated Web control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.
trans-unit.target: 为关联的 Web 控件提供呈现功能，以修改特定浏览器的默认标记或行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class adapts the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> control to modify the default markup or behavior for a specific browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类改写关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>控件来修改默认标记或特定浏览器的行为。

trans-unit.source: You can extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class to further customize rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类来进一步自定义呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: Adapters are compiled .NET Framework components that take over one or more stages in the life cycle of a page or control.
trans-unit.target: 适配器是编译接管生命周期的页或控件的一个或多个阶段的.NET Framework 组件。

trans-unit.source: Extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class will provide access to the life-cycle stages of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类将提供访问权限的生命周期阶段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 适配器的初始请求导致要搜索的给定请求的浏览器的特征的控件的映射适配器的.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: Browser definition files are used by the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class to identify the characteristics of the client browser and map the adapter to the browser type.
trans-unit.target: 使用浏览器定义文件<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>类来标识客户端浏览器的特征并映射到浏览器类型的适配器。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: For a description of the adaptive rendering architecture of ASP.NET and a step-by-step walkthrough that shows how to implement a control adapter and map it to a control, see "Authoring ASP.NET Server Control Adapters: An Introduction" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 有关 ASP.NET 和的分步演练，演示如何实现控件适配器并将其映射到控件的自适应呈现体系结构的说明，请参阅"创作 ASP.NET 服务器控件适配器:: 简介"在MSDN库中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class to display a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control in an enabled and disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类来显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件中启用和禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: This example contains three parts:
trans-unit.target: 此示例包含三个部分：

trans-unit.source: An adapter derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: 适配器派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类。

trans-unit.source: The .aspx file that incorporates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control and device-specific content.
trans-unit.target: 包含在.aspx 文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件和特定于设备的内容。

trans-unit.source: A browser file to link the adapter to a device type.
trans-unit.target: 要链接到一种设备类型的适配器的浏览器文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declare a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control with device-specific content.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>具有特定于设备的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to link the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control to the custom adapter for browsers running on Windows CE .NET.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控件添加到运行在 Windows CE.NET 上的浏览器的自定义适配器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework constructs an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 构造的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类。

trans-unit.source: The initial request for an adapter causes the .NET Framework to search for a mapped adapter for the control given the characteristics of the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 适配器的初始请求导致要搜索的给定请求的浏览器的特征的控件的映射适配器的.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: Once found, the control holds a reference to the mapped adapter instance in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一次找到，该控件包含对中的映射的适配器实例的引用其<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For information on adapter mappings and browser definition files, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff).
trans-unit.target: 有关适配器映射和浏览器定义文件的信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> containing methods to build and render the device-specific output.
trans-unit.target: 包含可生成和呈现特定于设备的输出的方法的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the associated Web control to the output stream as HTML.
trans-unit.target: 将关联的 Web 控件以 HTML 格式写入到输出流中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A> method writes the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> control to the output stream as HTML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A>方法将写入关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>写入输出流以 html 格式的控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the .NET Framework calls on the Web server control's own <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，.NET Framework 调用在 Web 服务器控件的自己<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Render%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, once the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A> property of that control is set, the .NET Framework will execute the adapter's implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A> event over that of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 但是，一旦<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Adapter%2A>设置该控件的属性时，.NET Framework 将执行的适配器的实现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A>优先于关联控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A> event is used to perform modifications to the markup code that is rendered to a device browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A>事件用于执行呈现到的设备浏览器的标记代码的修改。

trans-unit.source: Control properties should be set prior to this phase of the life cycle and only the actual markup creation for the control done here.
trans-unit.target: 在此处完成控件的生命周期和仅实际标记创建的这个阶段之前，应设置控件属性。

trans-unit.source: Changes made to the control in this stage of the life cycle are not saved to view state.
trans-unit.target: 在此阶段的生命周期对控件所做的更改不保存到视图状态。

trans-unit.source: For saving changes made to the control, override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A> event.
trans-unit.target: 保存对控件所做更改，重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter.OnPreRender%2A>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A> event also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate, which is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A>事件还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托，委托是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A> method to pass the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object to the parent control for rendering if the associated control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter.Render%2A>方法可以传递<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>对用于呈现如果启用了关联的控件的父控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.HideDisabledControlAdapter>类。
